title: React JS Developer
description: Developed and maintained web applications using React JS and TypeScript, ensuring high performance and scalability.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to create responsive and visually appealing user interfaces for payment gateway solutions.
Integrated RESTful APIs and third-party services to enhance the functionality of KisPay's platform.
Optimized front-end code for faster load times and a smooth user experience, following best practices and code reviews.
Implemented state management using React hooks and Context API for efficient data flow across components.
Worked in an Agile environment, attending daily standups and sprint planning sessions, to ensure the timely delivery of features.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive design for a seamless experience on all devices and screen sizes.
Contributed to improving code quality by writing unit and integration tests using Jest and React Testing Library.
